sources.title: Curtain at Eight
sources.description: An elderly detective (C. Aubrey Smith) sets out to find who murdered a stage actor.

sources.title: Curtain at Eight (1933) DETECTIVE
sources.description:
Stars: C. Aubrey Smith, Dorothy Mackaill, Paul Cavanagh
 Director: E. Mason Hopper

 An elderly detective sets out to find who murdered a stage actor.

sources.title: CURTAIN AT EIGHT video quality upgrade
sources.description: This print is noticeably sharper and with better shadow detail than the other version here at IA. A backstage whodunit featuring C Aubrey Smith, Dorothy Mackaill and Paul Cavanagh. However, the cast is frequently upstaged by a lovestruck chimp who sadly is unnamed and uncredited. Directed by E Mason Hopper Released in 1933 complete print

metadata.Plot: An elderly detective sets out to find who murdered a stage actor.
metadata.Writer: Edward T. Lowe Jr., Octavus Roy Cohen
metadata.Actors: C. Aubrey Smith, Dorothy Mackaill, Paul Cavanagh
